mutants.code:
import itertools
import bisect

def find_permutation_distance(N, P, Q):
    Nums = [str(n) for n in range(1, N + 1)]
    perms = itertools.permutations(Nums)
    perm_list = sorted([int(''.join(perm)) for perm in perms])
    p_int = int(''.join(map(str, P)))
    q_int = int(''.join(map(str, Q)))
    a = bisect.bisect_left(perm_list, p_int)
    b = bisect.bisect_left(perm_list, q_int)
    return abs(a + b)

import itertools
import bisect

def find_permutation_distance(N, P, Q):
    Nums = [str(n) for n in range(1, N + 1)]
    perms = itertools.permutations(Nums)
    perm_list = sorted([int(''.join(perm)) for perm in perms])
    p_int = int(''.join(map(str, P)))
    q_int = int(''.join(map(str, Q)))
    a = bisect.bisect_left(perm_list, p_int)
    b = bisect.bisect_left(perm_list, q_int)
    return abs(a * b)

import itertools
import bisect

def find_permutation_distance(N, P, Q):
    Nums = [str(n) for n in range(1, N + 1)]
    perms = itertools.permutations(Nums)
    perm_list = sorted([int(''.join(perm)) for perm in perms])
    p_int = int('MUTATED'.join(map(str, P)))
    q_int = int(''.join(map(str, Q)))
    a = bisect.bisect_left(perm_list, p_int)
    b = bisect.bisect_left(perm_list, q_int)
    return abs(a - b)

import itertools
import bisect

def find_permutation_distance(N, P, Q):
    Nums = [str(n) for n in range(1, N + 1)]
    perms = itertools.permutations(Nums)
    perm_list = sorted([int('MUTATED'.join(perm)) for perm in perms])
    p_int = int(''.join(map(str, P)))
    q_int = int(''.join(map(str, Q)))
    a = bisect.bisect_left(perm_list, p_int)
    b = bisect.bisect_left(perm_list, q_int)
    return abs(a - b)
